price: (216) And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
